EDIT PAGES: You can download the webpage by right-clicking the "Download Page" icon and edit it with your own HTML editor and upload the webpage file by clicking the "Upload Page" icon below. You can edit your email page with the provided WYSIWYG editor by clicking the "Edit Page Content" icon below. Web page resources (e.g. images, stylesheets, etc.) can be uploaded in your Resource Center with the Upload Files option. Include the desired document URL in your web page.

PRESENTATION PAGE LINKS: You can link Presentation Pages to each other with the URL: pp.asp?pg=x where x is the page # to the left of the page name below. This will provide full tracking of the visitor's viewed pages.

This Marketing Website can be accessed by a member if the "Member Access" checkbox above is checked OR if the member's # is in the Distribution List below OR if the member belongs to the team # listed above.
Each Member # in the distribution list must be surrounded by commas. (1000 character max.)

SEO SETTINGS: Specify the following page title, description and keywords for optimizing this Marketing Website for the Internet Search Engines. If no title is specified the search engines will be instructed to not index this page. View the tips below for optimizing your Marketing Website for search engine placement.
Provide examples of promotions that can be used for this Lead Page. Examples may include Internet listings, Google AdWords listings, email signatures, classified ads, etc.
Presentations
Click the pencil icon to edit the item below. Select the "Add New" link in the upper right hand corner of this page.
Personalize

Click the name of the Lead Page or the 2nd Preview icon to view the Lead Page as it will appear to your prospect. Click the 1st "Send" icon to email the Lead Page to a friend. Click the 3rd Usage icon to view instructions on how to use your personal Lead Page address.

Click the name of the Presentation or the 2nd Preview icon to view the Presentation as it will appear to your prospect. Click the 1st "Send" icon to email the Presentation to a friend. Click the 3rd Usage icon to view instructions on how to use your personal Presentation address.

Upload Image File

Click the Browse button to select an image from your personal computer. After you have selected the desired image file, click the Submit button to upload it. The image file will be displayed at 190px wide. It must be no larger than 50K in size and must be a .png, .gif or .jpg file.
